p1_settings_validation.name: Settings Validation
verification_commands: python3 -c "from src.application.settings.base_settings import BaseSettings; print('validate' in dir(BaseSettings))"
p1_settings_validation.notes: Added ValidationResult, FieldValidator, validated_field(), validate() method to BaseSettings. Updated DetectOnsetsBlockSettings with 19 validated fields as proof of concept.

p1_settings_registry.name: Settings Registry
p1_settings_registry.notes: Created SettingsRegistry with register_settings() and register_block_settings() decorators. Updated DetectOnsets and LoadAudio settings to use decorators. 26 tests passing.

p1_base_repository.name: BaseRepository Pattern
p1_base_repository.description: Create generic BaseRepository with common CRUD operations
p1_base_repository.notes: Created BaseRepository with exists(), require_exists(), require_unique_field(), list_all(), count(), delete_by_id(), SQL generation helpers. Custom exceptions: EntityNotFoundError, DuplicateEntityError. 31 tests passing.

p1_status_publisher.name: StatusPublisher Pattern
p1_status_publisher.notes: Created StatusPublisher pattern with StatusLevel enum, Status dataclass, StatusPublisher base class, StatusSubscriber helper, and QtStatusPublisher for Qt integration. 37 tests passing.

p1_module_registry.name: ModuleRegistry Pattern
p1_module_registry.description: Create generic registry for all module types
p1_module_registry.notes: Created ModuleRegistry with register(), register_class(), get(), list_all(), search(), get_by_tag(). Global registry factory with get_registry(), register_component() decorator. 30 tests passing.

p1_validation_framework.name: Validation Framework
p1_validation_framework.notes: Created validation framework with Validator base, common validators (Required, Range, Pattern, Length, Choices, Type, Custom), composable validators (All, Any), and convenience functions. 56 tests passing.

p2_create_structure.name: Create Base Structure
p2_create_structure.notes: Created src/features/ with 6 feature modules (projects, blocks, connections, execution, setlists, ma3), each with domain/application/infrastructure layers. Created ui/features/ and ui/shared/. 32 __init__.py files.

p2_migrate_shared.notes: Organized src/shared/ with events, domain/entities, and utils modules. Created re-exports for backwards compatibility. All 208 tests passing.

p2_migrate_connections.name: Migrate Connections Feature

p2_migrate_execution.name: Migrate Execution Feature
p2_migrate_execution.notes: Created vertical structure for ExecutionEngine, topological_sort, ProgressTracker, and TypeValidator.

p2_migrate_setlists.name: Migrate Setlists Feature

p2_cleanup.name: Phase 2 Cleanup
p2_cleanup.description: Remove old structure, verify imports, run tests
p2_cleanup.notes: Verified all feature modules (42 new files in src/features and src/shared). All imports work correctly. All 208 unit tests passing. Backwards compatibility maintained via re-exports.

p3_showmanager_reorg.name: ShowManager Module Reorganization
p3_showmanager_reorg.description: Align ShowManager with vertical module structure (Phase 0)
verification_commands: python3 -c "from src.features.show_manager.domain import EditorLayerEntity, MA3TrackEntity; print('OK')"
p3_showmanager_reorg.notes: Moved LayerSyncController, EditorLayerEntity, MA3TrackEntity, and all layer sync commands to src/features/show_manager/. Created layer_sync_types.py with shared enums (SyncDirection, ConflictResolution, LayerSyncStatus). Added re-exports in old locations for backwards compatibility. Updated migration_compat.py for old project files. Fixed circular import in commands __init__.py using lazy imports. All 266 tests passing (excluding 23 legacy layer_mappings tests that will be updated in Phase 2).

p3_sync_subscription.name: Sync Subscription Service
p3_sync_subscription.notes: Created SyncSubscriptionService with PyQt signals (layer_changed, events_changed, sync_requested, sync_completed, connection_status_changed). Features: subscribe/unsubscribe with wildcards, callback support, convenience functions for creating events. 28 unit tests passing. Total 294 tests passing.

p3_editor_api.name: Editor Unified API
p3_editor_api.description: Implement unified layer/event API with signals (Phase 1B)
p3_editor_api.notes: Created EditorAPI with unified interface for layer/event operations. Features: LayerInfo/EventInfo dataclasses, create/update/delete/get layer methods, add_events/get_events methods, automatic signal emission via SyncSubscriptionService, local signals for direct connections. 25 unit tests passing. Total 319 tests passing.

p3_layer_sync_settings.description: Update data model for explicit synced layers (Phase 2)
p3_layer_sync_settings.notes: Replace layer_mappings with synced_layers list. Controller wires to SyncSubscriptionService.

p3_layer_sync_commands.name: Layer Sync Commands
p3_layer_sync_commands.notes: Commands use EditorAPI for layer operations. Subscribe to changes on add, unsubscribe on remove.

p3_layer_sync_ui.name: Layer Sync Dialogs + UI

p3_layer_sync_ui.notes: Dialogs for adding layers/tracks. Table shows only synced layers with status and actions.

p3_editor_incremental.description: Replace bulk clear/recreate with incremental updates (Phase 5)
p3_editor_incremental.notes: Preserve synced layers during execution. Use EditorAPI for all operations. Diff-based updates.

p3_sync_handlers.name: Sync Change Handlers
p3_sync_handlers.notes: Editor->MA3 and MA3->Editor sync handlers. Conflict resolution. Status updates.

p3_integration_tests.name: Editor/LayerSync Integration Testing
p3_integration_tests.notes: Test all scenarios: add/remove sync, execution, auto-sync, conflicts, save/load.
